alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Durham; Harnett; Johnston; Lee; Moore; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 5:42PM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...a broken line of heavy showers and isolated thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Moore, central Harnett, Lee, Wake, northwestern Johnston, eastern Chatham, southeastern Durham and central Franklin Counties through 700 PM EST... At 540 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers and isolated storms along a line extending from 10 miles west of Cary to near Sanford to near Carthage. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Durham, Cary, Sanford, Louisburg, Lillington, Wake Forest, Garner, Fuquay-Varina and Clayton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These showers and storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Chatham; Durham; Harnett; Johnston; Lee; Moore; Wake
